final_poem:
The waves crash on the weathered shore,
A soothing melody, forever more.
The salty scent of sea and sand entwines,
As gulls soar high, their cries echoing in time.

In turquoise depths, a world below unseen,
Lies hidden gardens, secrets yet unclean.
The tides ebb and flow with ceaseless might,
A dance of power, under starry night.

Where light dissolves into dark blue haze,
A symphony of whispers, ancient ways.
The ocean's heartbeat, pulsing strong and free,
Echoes the mystery, that beckons me.
